name: SUPER SLIME
description:
SUPER SLIME is a hardcore game based on making it as far as possible into The Dungeon, when you die, you will be redirected to the first level , to be tormented by having to go through the agony of all the previous levels once again.

What makes SUPER SLIME different from other platformer's is its unique jump charge mechanic to move around, meaning you can only jump and move in the same way as would an average slime.

Dev message : SUPER SLIME will not always be free with optional donations, i just don't feel comfortable making people pay for an unfinished game so until its finished, please enjoy the game for free, share it, spread it around and have fun.
